name: Unleash
overview: Import feature flags from Unleash to LaunchDarkly.
description: Import feature flags from Unleash to LaunchDarkly. Customize a tag to be assigned to each flag imported.
author: LaunchDarkly

formVariables.name: Unleash API Key
formVariables.description: An API key with read permissions on your Unleash project

formVariables.name: Unleash Project ID
formVariables.description: The ID of the Unleash project to import from

formVariables.name: Unleash Environment ID
formVariables.description: The ID of the Unleash environment to import variants from

formVariables.name: Unleash Tag
formVariables.description: Provide a tag to only import a subset of your flags from Unleash based on the tag. Leave blank to import all flags.

formVariables.name: LaunchDarkly API Key
formVariables.description: An API key with create flag permissions on your LaunchDarkly account

formVariables.name: LaunchDarkly Tag
formVariables.description: A tag to apply to all flags imported from Unleash to LaunchDarkly.

formVariables.name: LaunchDarkly Maintainer
formVariables.description: The member id of the LaunchDarkly user who will be the maintainer of the imported flags.
